CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the appropriate HOMO and LUMO energy levels , an effective balance was produced.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. HOMO (Hybrid Orbital Molecular Orbital)
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "HOMO" and "LUMO".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. HOMO
2. LUMO

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the appropriate HOMO and LUMO energy levels , an effective balance was produced.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are:

1. HOMO (Hydrogen-Oriented Molecular Orbital) energy level - This is a property of the molecule that refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) in the molecule.
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) energy level - This is another property of the molecule that refers to the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) in the molecule.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are HOMO and LUMO energy levels.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Property Value - This is the most general term that refers to the value of a material property.
2. HOMO (Hydrogen-Oriented Molecular Orbital) energy level - This is a specific value of a material property, which refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in a molecule.
3. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) energy level - This is another specific value of a material property, which refers to the energy level of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital in a molecule.

So, the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. Property Value
2. HOMO energy level
3. LUMO energy level

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Property Value |
| HOMO energy level |
| LUMO energy level |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
